title: “Getting Started with Hugo Noir” date: 2026-02-07T12:00:00+09:00 draft: false tags: [“Hugo”, “Web Development”, “Noir Theme”]

Welcome to my first blog post using the elegant Hugo Noir theme! This post will cover the initial setup and customization options.
